description:
In the distant future, people build their homes and raise domestic animals in subterranean caverns called "pits". This way of life has persisted for hundreds of years, and yet, the people are still powerless against the earthquakes and cave-ins which occasionally devastate their villages. Jeeha is one such village...
One day, while digging tunnels to expand Jeeha`s edges, a boy named http://anidb.net/ch469 [Simon] happens to find a small, shiny drill. Meanwhile, http://anidb.net/ch468 [Kamina] — Simon`s soon-to-be "bro" — insists that there is another land above the village and tries to break through the ceiling in order to leave the cavern. He fails; however, an earthquake suddenly occurs, the ceiling collapses, and a gigantic robot — a "Ganmen" — crashes to the cave floor!
Kamina is now certain that there is a world above their tiny pit-village. Encouraged, he begins to fight recklessly against the robot, until he encounters another person who has arrived from the land above. She is a beautiful girl by the name of http://anidb.net/ch470 [Youko], who has come from a neighbouring village with a rifle in hand. She has been hunting the robot, but her shots only seem to irritate it. Desperately trying to escape its attacks, Simon brings Kamina and Youko to what he had previously found: a mysterious robot with a head for a body.
And so begins the "epic" adventure...
Source: AnimeNfo

REGULAR.description:
Living underground in Giha Village, Simon and Kamina dream of a life on the surface. When their home is invaded from above, it is up to them to activate the mysterious mecha Lagann and save their village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Durchbrich den Himmel mit deinem Bohrer
Omae no Drill de Ten o Tsuke!!
Pierce the Heavens with Your Drill!
Swoim wiertłem przebij się przez niebiosa!
Transpercer les cieux avec ta vrille !
Trapassa i cieli con la tua trivella
お前のドリルで天を突け!!

REGULAR.description:
Now that they`ve made it to the surface, Simon and Kamina must join together with Yoko and her village to defeat the Beastmen pursuing them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ho detto che lo piloterò io
Ich sagte, ich werde dieses Ding steuern
J`ai dit que c`est moi qui le piloterai !!
俺が乗るって言ってんだ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kamina and Simon must work together to defeat a dangerous new Beastman threat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ty, z dwoma twarzami, nie podskakuj
Was glaubst du, wer du bist mit deinen zwei Gesichtern?
You Two-Faced Son of a Bitch!
Ты кто такой, с двумя рожами?
頭が2つたぁナマイキな!!

REGULAR.description:
Team Gurren must work together with the eccentric Black Syblings to take down a Beastman foe on empty stomachs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auch mit vielen Gesichtern bist du kein starker Typ
C`est pas le nombre de têtes qui compte !
Does Having So Many Faces Make You Great?
Kao ga Ookerya Erai no ka!?
Tante Facce Non Ti Rendono Migliore
顔が多けりゃ偉いのか!?

REGULAR.description:
Team Gurren must find their way out of a strange underground village where they worship Gunmen as divine beings.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Don`t Understand It at All!
Sérieux, je pige que dalle a tout ça !
俺にはさっぱり判らねえ!

REGULAR.description:
Continuing to the Gunmen rallying point, Team Gurren finds themselves on a strange hot springs getaway.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All of You Bastards Put Us in Hot Water!
Es gibt ein paar Dinge, die ich unbedingt sehen muß!
Quel Che Voglio Vedere lo Voglio Vedere
てめえら全員湯あたりしやがれ!!

REGULAR.description:
Thymilph, one of the Four Divine Generals of the mysterious Spiral King, arrives to support Viral`s Enki, with the massive mobile Gunmen fortress, the Dai-Ganzan. Kamina and Simon pilot the Gurren-Lagann against seemingly overwhelming odds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cette fois, c`est toi qui va te charger du boulot
Di Questo Te ne Occuperai Tu!
Sore wa Omae ga Yarunda yo!!
You`ll Be the One To Do That!
それはお前がやるんだよ!!

REGULAR.description:
Having temporarily stalled Viral and Thymilph in the last skirmish, the Team Gurren and their newly arrived allies join forces as "Team Dai-Gurren" and launch a decisive strike against the regrouping Gunmen force.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Dai-Gurren is still mourning on Kamina`s death. Simon notices a Gunman throw a capsule into a deep valley. He inspects it and is able to open it, and inside is a human girl named Nia, but their introduction is cut short when an enemy Gunman appears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Just What Exactly Is a Human?
ヒトっていったい何ですか?

REGULAR.description:
Having been temporarily spared by Adiane, another of the Four Divine Generals, Team Dai-Gurren uses the reprieve to reassess their situation. Nia learns of Kamina`s significance in Simon`s erratic behavior and offers him some stinging, yet honest advice, which draws the ire of an untrusting Yoko. With tension building within the Team, the crew scrambles to stand by Nia`s side when Adiane returns to complete her stalled attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`était quoi comme genre de type, ton frangin ?
Chi era la persona che chiami "fratello"?
Who Really Was Your Big Brother?
アニキっていったい誰ですか?

REGULAR.description:
Team Dai-Gurren falls into a trap set by the third member of the Four Divine Generals, Guame. The Team is taken captive and stored underground to await execution. While digging an escape path, Simon finally understands Kamina`s last words to him and after having a discussion with Guame, Nia finds out the reason why she was thrown away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シモン, 手をどけて

REGULAR.description:
On their way to Teppelin, the Beastmen`s capital city, Team Dai-Gurren stumbles upon a vast ocean and must wait for modifications on the Dai-Gurren to be completed before crossing it. While the rest of the group play at the beach, Yoko starts to feel uneasy about Nia and all the attention she gets from them. After preparations are complete, Team Dai-Gurren begins their sea cruise, oblivious to the fact that an ambush is underway by Adiane and Viral.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mademoiselle Yoko, j`ai une faveur à vous demander
Yoko, tust du mir einen Gefallen?
Youko-san, I Have Something to Ask of You
ヨーコさん, お願いがあります

REGULAR.description:
Trying to do her part in Team Dai-Gurren, Nia decides to become a cook, but just before the crew have a taste of her dishes, Cytomander, the fourth member of the Divine Generals, launches an aerial attack on the Dai-Gurren. Simon leads the counter-attack on the Gurren-Lagann, this time accompanied by Yoko, who replaces a sick Rossiu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everybody, Eat to Your Heart`s Content
みなさん, たーんと召しあがれ

REGULAR.description:
At last, Team Dai-Gurren arrives at the outskirts of Teppelin, but before aiming to the city, they must face a combined full-scale attack of Cytomander and Guame`s forces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 皆さん, ごきげんよう

REGULAR.description:
The last of the Divine Generals fall, and the city of Teppelin collapses, revealing a Gunman of gigantic proportions. Simon and Nia struggle to pass through it in order to confront her father, the Spiral King himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ich werde in die Zukunft aufbrechen
私は明日へ向かいます

REGULAR.description:
During the following seven years, a new civilization rises and prospers under Simon`s leadership. However, these peaceful times come to end when the threat mentioned in Lordgenome`s last words starts to reveal itself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vous n`avez rien compris ou quoi ?
あなたは何も分かってない

REGULAR.description:
After the Anti-Spirals` first attack and Nia`s astonishing announcement, Simon looks desperately for her, while Rossiu finally completes his secret project.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Expliquez-moi les énigmes de ce monde
I`ll Make You Tell the Truth of the World
Kikasete Morauzo Kono Sekai no Nazo o
Opowiedz mi o sekretach tego świata
Svelami i segreti di questo mondo
Verrat mir die Geheimnisse dieser Welt
聞かせてもらうぞ この世界の謎を

REGULAR.description:
To soothe the public opinion, Rossiu overthrows Simon and puts him under arrest. But when the Anti-Spirals launch a large-scale attack on Kamina City, he is left with no option but to let Simon engage the enemy using the Gurren-Lagann, not before resorting to extremes to put him under his control.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikinokorunda Donna Shudan o Tsukatte mo
Musimy żyć, bez względu na wszystko
Noi tutti sopravviveremo, con ogni mezzo!
Nous devons survivre, peu importe les moyens à employer
We Must Survive. No Matter What It Takes!
Wir werden überleben, koste es, was es wolle
Мы должны спастись во что бы то ни стало
生き残るんだ どんな手段を使っても

REGULAR.description:
As Simon arrives in prison, he unexpectedly meets Viral, who comments on how far he has fallen. Meanwhile, the truth about Rossiu`s emergency plan and the consequences for those left behind on Earth are revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bóg sprawdza nas aż do końca
Dieu, jusqu`où irez-vous pour nous tester ?
Fino a che punto Dio ci metterà alla prova?
Kami wa Doko made Bokura o Tamesu
Oh God, To How Far Will You Test Us?
Wie lange will Gott uns noch prüfen?
Сколько ещё нас ждёт Господних испытаний?
神はどこまで僕らをためす

REGULAR.description:
One year earlier, Yoko starts working as a schoolteacher on an island until she learns of the situation at Teppelin and returns to break Simon free. Once again reunited, Simon and the members of Team Dai-Gurren launch themselves into space to protect the Arc-Gurren from the enemy forces, now accompanied by Viral as co-pilot of the Gurren-Lagann.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Du bist jemand, der überleben sollte
Tu sei tra le persone che devono sopravvivere
Vous devriez être la dernière personne à survivre !
あなたは生き残るべき人だ

REGULAR.description:
The Gurren-Lagann and the Arc-Gurren join together to form the massive Arc-Gurren-Lagann and stop the Human Annihilation System.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Questo è il mio ultimo dovere
Sore ga Boku no Saigo no Gimu Da
それが僕の最後の義務だ

REGULAR.description:
The members of Team Dai-Gurren make their preparations for the imminent war against the Anti-Spirals, but Rossiu is missing. However, when Kinon tells Simon about what he really intends to do, both start to look desperately for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route pour le combat final
Vorwärts, dies ist die finale Schlacht
行くぞ 最後の戦いだ

REGULAR.description:
Guided by Simon and Nia`s feelings for each other, Team Dai-Gurren break through dimensions in search for the Anti-Spirals` homeworld. But after falling into the enemy`s trap, they end up losing some of their most precious members, due to its vicious offensive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ich vergesse niemals diese Minute, diese Sekunde
Je n`oublierai jamais cette minute, cette seconde !
Nigdy nie zapomnę tej minuty, tej sekundy
Non potrò mai dimenticare questo preciso momento!
Wasureru Mono ka Kono Ippun Ichibyou o
We Will Never Forget, This Minute and Second
Это мгновение будет со мной всегда!
忘れるものか この一分一秒を

REGULAR.description:
Team Dai-Gurren struggles to escape from the ocean of despair created by the Anti-Spirals without success, until history repeats itself, as another irreplaceable member of the Team sacrifices himself to save the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Que ta dernière volonté soit respectée !
Sarò io a compiere le tue ultime volontà!
お前の遺志は受け取った

REGULAR.description:
After finally transforming their flagship into the Super Galactic Gurren-Lagann, Simon and his friends successfully fight back against the enemy. When their enemy starts to use their own memories and desires against them, Kamina reappears to help.
Source: crunchyroll

At last, Simon and Nia are reunited, and by combining the power of its members, Team Dai-Gurren creates the galaxy-sized Tengen Toppa Gurren-Lagann, and engage the Anti-Spiral threat in a decisive battle to determine the fate of the universe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All the Lights in the Sky are Stars
Die Lichter im Himmel sind Sterne
Ten no Hikari wa Subete Hoshi
Tutte le luci in cielo sono stelle
Wszystkie światła na niebie to gwiazdy
Все эти огни в небе — звёзды...
Dans la vie, y`a des occases qu`un mec peut pas rater !
I`ll See What I Wanna See!!
見てえものは見てえんだ!!

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 天元突破グレンラガン

titles.title: อภินิหารหุ่นทะลวงสวรรค์ กุเร็นลากันน์
天元突破 グレンラガン
天元突破 红莲螺岩
Гуррен Лаганн - прочь из этого мира
天元突破 红莲之眼
